questions.q: What distinguishes VariableWorks Studio from other analytics platforms?
questions.a: Our patented technology, 3-year R&D collaboration with KKB, and modular structure specifically optimized for the banking sector set us apart.

questions.q: How does the modular structure work? Can I use only the modules I need?
questions.a: Yes, we have a completely modular structure. You can choose from data enrichment only, analytics platform only, or fully integrated solution options.

questions.q: What is the difference between Level 1, 2, and 3 in KKB variables?
questions.a: Level 1 contains basic variables, Level 2 includes advanced risk scoring variables, and Level 3 consists of complex variables with multi-dimensional and time series analyses.

questions.q: What does the Smart Variable Selection feature do?
questions.a: This AI-powered feature automatically selects variables with the highest predictive power from tens of thousands of options and accelerates the model development process.

questions.q: Is the platform cloud-based or can it be installed on-premise?
questions.a: Both options are available. We offer cloud, on-premise, or hybrid architecture support.

questions.q: How long does the installation and integration process take?
questions.a: While it varies depending on the project scope, our modular structure enables rapid implementation.
